      • addToSquad

        public void addToSquad(FantasyPlayerListing oListing,
              double dPriority)
                throws FantasyInvalidSelectionException
        Add this listing to the squad with the given priority
        Parameters:
        oListing -
        dPriority - The players worth to the squad (e.g. expected points), this is used to select the starting lineup and substitute ordering.
        Throws:
        FantasyInvalidSelectionException

      • addToSquad

        public void addToSquad(FantasyPlayerListing oListing,
              double dPriority,
              double dExpPoints,
              double dAppProb)
                throws FantasyInvalidSelectionException
        Add this listing to the squad with the given priority. Expected points and appearance probability can also be included and are included for reference when toString() is called
        Parameters:
        oListing -
        dPriority - The players worth to the squad (e.g. expected points), this is used to select the starting lineup and substitute ordering.
        Throws:
        FantasyInvalidSelectionException
